chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now we are going to solve our practice question number 7.

chunks.text: I have to create these four cells in this TR tag.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So it has occupied two rows.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Only one column.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So it has occupied a single row.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So here is one row and two columns.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So it has occupied two rows and one single column.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: So let's write two rows and a single column here.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: I will give it red eyes.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: The weight cell occupies one row and one column.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: Now we are going to create the second row.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: First of all, we will create a data cell in the second row.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: In which the height will come.

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: And the weight will be written in the cell other than that.

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs

chunks.title: Practice Qs
chunks.text: But as soon as I created the second row,

chunks.title: Practice Qs
